lines.gurmukhi: qo so n nwQu AnwQ n mo sir; qo so n dwnI n mo so iBKwrI [

Unknown.translation: O  True Guru! there is no Master like You. But there is no one as dependent as I am. There is no one as great a donor as You and there is no beggar as needy as me.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: quhwfy vrgw nwQ sÍwmI qy myry vrgw dIn AnwQ D`ikAw hoXw koeI nhIˆ, eykUM hI quhwfy vrgw dwqw qy myry vrgw mMgqw koeI nhIˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: mo so n dIn dieAwlu n qo sir; mo so AigAwnu n qo so ibcwrI [

Unknown.translation: No one is as miserable as I am but none is as clement as You. No one is as ignorant as I am but there is no one as knowledgeable as You.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: myry vrgw dIn Awqur qy qyry vrgw idAwlU nhIˆ qy myry vrgw AigAwnI Aqy qyry vrgw vIcwrvwn sÎwxw nhIˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: mo so n pqiq n pwvn qo sir; mo so ibkwrI n qo so aupkwrI [

Unknown.translation: There is no one who has fallen so low in his deeds and actions as I am. But there is no one else who can purify anyone as much as you. There is no one as sinful as I am and none who can do good as much as you can.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: myry vrgw AnwcwrI pwpI qy quswfy vrgw pivqR krqw Ar myry vrgw ivkwrvwn qy quhwfy vrgw aupkwrI koeI nhIˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: myry hY Avgun qU gun swgr; jwq rswql Et iqhwrI [528[

Unknown.translation: I am full of faults and demerits but You are an ocean of virtues. You are my refuge on my way to hell.  (528)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: myry ivc qwˆ AOgux hI AOgux hn, qy qUM guxwˆ dw smuMdr hYˆ, mYˆ iesy kr ky pqwl nrkwˆ nUM grikAw jw irhw hwˆ b`s! quhwfI hI iek mwqR Et shwrw hY ]528]
